name: Baked Fruit Dip
author: Kelly M.
summary: This warm and cheesy fruit dip has become a favorite with friends and family! The blend of cheese and fruit creates a wonderful flavor. Although it can be served with crackers, it's especially wonderful served with sliced apples and pears.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package soft style cream cheese with pineapple
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, blend the cream cheese, Swiss cheese, cranberries, orange juice, and apple juice
Scoop into a 9 inch pie pan
Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly and lightly browned
